item.title: God’s Love: The Most Joyous to the Soul
item.description:
God’s Love: The Most Joyous to the Soul by undefined Susan H. Porter, First Counselor in the Primary General Presidency given in Saturday Afternoon of 191st Semiannual General Conference on Thu Sep 30 2021
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Susan H. Porter, First Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
